info.name: Walkout Backend API - Complete
info.description:
Complete Walkout Backend API Collection with all endpoints organized by modules. Import this single file to get all APIs with automatic token management, ID auto-save, and detailed examples.

## Features:
- ✓ Automatic token save on login/signup
- ✓ Auto-save all IDs (user, region, office, team, etc.)
- ✓ No manual updates needed
- ✓ Comprehensive validation examples
- ✓ Bulk operations support
- ✓ Archive management

## Base URL:
http://localhost:5000

## Authentication:
Use Login endpoint to get token. Token is automatically saved and used in all protected endpoints.

## Variables:
All important IDs are automatically saved as collection and environment variables.

request.description: Check if the API server is running
Register a new user. Returns JWT token that is automatically saved for subsequent requests.
Login with email and password. Returns JWT token that is automatically saved for subsequent requests.
Change user role (SuperAdmin only). Valid roles: user, admin, superAdmin
Get appointments for a specific office
Get filtered appointments list by office name and date range. Query params: officeName (required), startDate (optional), endDate (optional), limit, skip

Get all appointments for a specific patient in an office (no date filter). Returns all appointments for the patient regardless of date. Query params: officeName (required), patientId (required), limit, skip
Manually trigger provider schedule sync (Admin/SuperAdmin only)

item.name: Get Provider Schedule by Office and DOS

request.description: Get provider schedule for specific office and date of service (DOS)
Submit office section of walkout form. formRefId is optional but recommended for linking frontend form to walkout entry.
Get all walkouts with optional filters: formRefId, officeName, dos. Supports pagination.
Update office section with complete validation. Includes batch error collection and conditional field saving.
